name: Ahmed abdel Gawad
title: Teacher of Law and Partner
company: Cairo University and ADSERO Law Firm
bio: I am teacher of criminal law and M&A and Capital Markets later for 20 years.
howCanYouSupport: Happy to provide general legal advisory or direct to relevant experts

name: SHAHINAZ ABOU EL NAGA
title: Cheif Human Capital Officer
bio:
I had the overall responsibility for the HR Department in Egypt to align the HR support to the business.
strategies while supporting the customers (employees & management team) in the areas of 
compensation, bonus plan, recruitment, employee relations, coaching, performance management, 
rewards and recognition, HR policies, HR communication, HR tools, turnover (employee departures, 
employee transfers, internal and external mobility), people development and payroll validation.
I managed to transform the HR Department from functional department to business partnering with 
the addition of having a new HR Services Center handling the administration part of all Hr functions. I 
worked on and maintained receiving the Top Employer Certification.
Before that I spent ten years in Orange Business Services, started by the position of HR Consultant and 
ended up Heading the HR Department for Egypt Site. Manage the HR functions to guarantee the 
efficient delivery of the HR functional contribution to the company in the short and long term. Initiate 
and support the job description and job evaluation process. Develop and implement recruitment plan 
to ensure that the company is seen as the Employer of Choice and right recruitment processes and 
selection techniques are in place to recruit the right employee. Worked on and maintained receiving 
the Top Employer Certification. Maintain the company performance management system, reward 
structure and career succession planning Ensure that all processes that are linked with performance 
management and career succession planning are monitored by the HR team in order to ascertain that 
all employees are equipped with the appropriate skills and knowledge to perform to their best Provide 
guidance and direction to the local HR team to ensure the implementation of the HR strategy and 
plans. Provide expert advice and coaching to managers to help them achieve their people objectives 
and initiate actions to motivate and engage people. Maintain and manage the HR systems and tools 
through efficient usage to ensure data integrity of all staff records Build multi-functional relationships, 
both as a member of the top management team and when working with people across all functions
on a day to day basis, creating an environment where information and resources are shared in pursuit 
of business goals. Manage and implement the compensation and benefits programs and policies to 
ensure that the organization is properly positioned in concurrence with the company strategy. Guide 
management and employee actions by developing, writing, and updating policies, procedures and 
guidelines to be in line with the local labor law. Prepare and administer the annual salary review for 
OBS Egypt employees Comply with the local labor law and local legal requirements by studying 
existing and new legislation. Ensure an efficient HR filing and record archiving system
